title: Development Operations Engineer Intern
summary: Designed C# web application to streamline secret management across multiple cloud platforms including Octopus & AWS.

Implemented dynamic key performance indicator script leveraging Python to drive data driven decision-making.

title: Website Designer
summary: Revamped the RPI Chemistry Department website to attract prospective students and boost enrollment.

title: Software Engineer Intern
summary: Remodeled the front end of an internal search engine utility to drive engagement rates and standardize use across the company.

title: Team Leader
summary: Led a team of 15+ members to achieve an average customer satisfaction score of 95%, exceeding company standards.
Implemented a new training program for new hires, reducing onboarding time by 20% and improving overall team efficiency.

title: Trainer
summary: Mentored new team members, resulting in a 25% faster adaptation period and higher initial performance scores.

title: Team Member
summary: Maintained perfect attendance and punctuality, demonstrating reliability and commitment to team success.
